LightningComponentBundle.masterLabel: DDRL: Data Cloud Filtered Related List Flow Component
LightningComponentBundle.description: Custom Data Cloud Related List component. For use in the Data Cloud Home CRM org, in Flow screens.

property.name: titleIcon
property.label: Title Icon
property.description: Icon to display next to title. Use any slds icon in format collection:icon eg. utility:feed

property.name: xconfigId
property.label: DDRL Config Id
property.description: The Data Cloud Related List Config Record Id.

property.name: xdataSourceId
property.label: Data Source Id
property.description: The name of the Data Cloud Data Source Id that relates to THIS record. To refresh this list with new Data Sources, re-run the Data Cloud Feed Configurator.

property.name: xdataSourceObjectId
property.label: Data Source Object Id
property.description: The name of the Data Cloud Data Source Object Id that relates to THIS record. To refresh this list with new Data Source Objects, re-run the Data Cloud Feed Configurator.

property.name: xindividualIdentityLinkObject
property.label: Identity Rulesets Individual Link Object Name

property.name: recordContactField
property.label: Record Contact Field
property.description: The field path from this record to a contact/lead. eg. on a case the field could be ContactId. On a Work Order it could be Case.ContactId.
